name: Prey r
description:
Glad to see you on the game page. At the moment it is a prototype of the game. But at the moment it has already been implemented: cutting down trees, an inventory system and crafting items, and most importantly - partial saving. In the future, you will need to survive, get resources, and strengthen your home in order to comfortably survive in this game.

After version 1.1.x, work on the location began.
